data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Due to Russia's aggressive actions towards its neighbors, the U.S. Congress is imposing restrictions on their government. The ____ is ____ intended ____ punishment ____ what ____ seen ____ interference ____ American ____. The ____ is ____ to ____ poorly ____ in Russia. But it may also be controversial in some parts of the American government.
data.partBlankContent: Due to Russia's aggressive actions towards its neighbors, the U.S. Congress is imposing restrictions on their government. The a__ is al__ intended a_ punishment f__ what i_ seen a_ interference i_ American elec_____. The mo__ is su__ to b_ poorly rece____ in Russia. But it may also be controversial in some parts of the American government.
data.answer: 由于俄罗斯对邻国的侵略行为，美国国会正在对他们的政府施加限制。该法案还旨在惩罚被视为干涉美国选举的行为。此举被认为在俄罗斯反响不佳。但它也可能在美国政府的某些部门引起争议。
